int arr [ 1000 ] [ 1000 ] = { 0 } ; int sum ( int row ) { if ( row < 1 ) return arr [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ; else { int col ; for ( col = 1 ; col <= row ; col ++ ) { if ( arr [ row + 1 ] [ col ] > arr [ row + 1 ] [ col + 1 ] ) arr [ row ] [ col ] += arr [ row + 1 ] [ col ] ; else arr [ row ] [ col ] += arr [ row + 1 ] [ col + 1 ] ; } return sum ( row - 1 ) ; } } int main ( ) { int t , n , j , i ; printf ( "Enter test cases:" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { printf ( "Enter no. of rows:
" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; printf ( "Enter the elements:
" ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) { if ( j < ( i + 1 ) ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; else arr [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } printf ( "%d
" , sum ( n - 1 ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
